name: pubmed_scrape_paper
description: Scrape a specific PubMed paper. Returns title, authors, abstract, DOI, and keywords.

steps.code: const title = document.querySelector('h1.heading-title')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const authors = []; document.querySelectorAll('.authors-list a.full-name').forEach(a => authors.push(a.textContent?.trim())); const abstract = document.querySelector('#eng-abstract p, .abstract-content p')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const doi = document.querySelector('a[data-ga-action="DOI"], .doi a')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const journal = document.querySelector('.journal-actions button, .cit')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const keywords = []; document.querySelectorAll('.keywords-list .keyword, .abstract + .keywords a').forEach(k => keywords.push(k.textContent?.trim())); return { pmid: '{{pmid}}', title, authors, abstract, doi, journal, keywords, url: window.location.href };
